name: Milk Fallout Team 22 - A fight game (ish)
name_original: Milk Fallout Team 22 - A fight game (ish)
description:
No Mac users - Sorry not Sorry

Team 22 - Milk Fallout

The game features a interactive Main Menu with a start button and an exit button for the user to click.

The game is in alpha state and needs some work on the AI.

Thank you all!
